verses.text: Then I \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and behold a \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, What \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* a \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*; the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add is\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, This \add is\add* the \w curse|strong="H0423"\w* that goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* over the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for every one that \w stealeth|strong="H1589"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H5352"\w* \add as\add* on this side \w according|strong="H3644"\w* to it; and every one that \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H5352"\w* \add as\add* on that side \w according|strong="H3644"\w* to it.\f + \fr 5.3 \ft every one that stealeth…: or, every one of this people that stealeth holdeth himself guiltless, as it doth\f*

I will bring it \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and it shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, and into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of him that \w sweareth|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: and it shall \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and shall \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* it with the \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* thereof and the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* thereof.

¶ Then the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* now thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what \add is\add* this that goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* it? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* that goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*. He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover, This \add is\add* their \w resemblance|strong="H5869"\w* through all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And, behold, there was lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*: and this \add is\add* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft talent: or, weighty piece\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*. And he \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* it into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*; and he \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* the \w weight|strong="H0068"\w* of \w lead|strong="H5777"\w* upon the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* thereof.

Then lifted I \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, there came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \add was\add* in their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*; for they \w had|strong="H2007"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* like the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of a \w stork|strong="H2624"\w*: and they lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* between the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* and the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.
Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I to the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me, Whither do these \w bear|strong="H3212"\w* the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, To \w build|strong="H1129"\w* it an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w*: and it shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3240"\w* there upon her own \w base|strong="H4369"\w*.
